director.name: 奥斯卡·鲁兹·纳维亚 Oscar Ruiz Navia

this_title: Coffee Defenders - A Path From Coca to Coffee
trans_title: 咖啡捍卫者：从古柯到咖啡的道路
introduction: Johana, a coffee farmer, embarks on a journey with Alexandra, a reporter in search of a story. In their mission to bring a coffee seedling from Johana's plantation from Colombia to Costa Rica, they encounter people and places who, like Johana, overcame moments of war to now stand as living proof of the rebirth of an entire region as it transformed from coca to coffee. The documentary, launched on Amazon Prime in select countries, is a project by The Lavazza Group, directed by Oscar Ruiz Navia.Agency: We Are Social, USAThe Lavazza Group, through its Lavazza Foundation, together with nonprofit Carcafe, has supported more than 100 local farmers in the Meta region of Colombia, providing them with the resources and education to enrich their coffee plantations and quality of life.
chinese_title: 咖啡捍卫者：从古柯到咖啡的道路
foreign_title: Coffee Defenders - A Path From Coca to Coffee
